wikipedia_page.main: William Marriott (6 January 1850 – 28 August 1887) was an English first-class cricketer active 1880–81 who played for Nottinghamshire. He was born in Hucknall-under-Huthwaite; died in Huyton.

response: *William Marriott (magician) (ca. 1910), British magician and psychic debunker
